		}

	allow = {
		has_country_flag = impossible
	}

		sea_defence = 3.1
		air_defence = 3.2
	}
	BB_Missouri = {
		sea_defence = 3.1
		air_defence = 3.2
	}

		sea_defence = 3.1
		air_defence = 3.2
	}

	}

Vickers_steel_hidden = {
	allow = {
		has_country_flag = impossible
	}

	BB_Missouri = {
		max_strength = -13.55
		sea_defence = -1.55
		build_cost_ic = -0.9
	}
	BB_Iowa = {
		max_strength = -13.55
		sea_defence = -1.55
		build_cost_ic = -0.9
	}

advanced_aircraft_development_hidden = {	# better aerodynamics

#### Airlaunched torpedoes
air_launched_torpedoes_hidden = {

	allow = {
		 has_country_flag = impossible
	}
	### CAG ###
	david_mccampbell = {
		sea_attack = 0.8
	}
	gregory_boyington = {
		sea_attack = 0.8
	}

	research_bonus_from = {
		submarine_engineering = 0.20
		naval_engineering = 0.15
		aeronautic_engineering = 0.10
	}

	difficulty = 1

	# common for all techs.
	change = no
	stealable = no
	start_year = 1918
	first_offset = 1919
	additional_offset = 1	# one new every 2 years
	max_level = 10
}

	}

	additional_offset = 1	#one new every year

#### bombing sights
bombing_sight_hidden = {  # 1930: Vector,  1939: area-sight (Mk. XIV), 1940 ABS Automated Bomb Sight, 1943 SABS Stabilized Automated Bomb Sight

	allow = {
		 has_country_flag = impossible
	}

	david_mccampbell = {
		hard_attack = 1
		sea_attack = 1.75
		surface_defence = 0.5
	}
	gregory_boyington = {
		hard_attack = 1
		sea_attack = 1.75
		surface_defence = 0.5
	}

	change = no
	stealable = no
	difficulty = 1

	# common for all techs.
	start_year = 1918
	first_offset = 1919
	additional_offset = 1	# one new every 2 years
	max_level = 6
}

super_heavy_battleship_technology_hidden = {

	allow = {
		 has_country_flag = impossible
	}

 	SBB_Yamato = {
		max_strength = 36
		sea_attack = 9.0
		convoy_attack = 3.69
		maximum_speed = 1
		range = 400
		sea_defence = 3.15
		air_defence = 4.68
		hull = 0.54
		build_cost_ic = -0.65
		positioning = 0.05
	}
 	SBB_Musashi = {
		max_strength = 36
		sea_attack = 9.0
		convoy_attack = 3.69
		maximum_speed = 1
		range = 400
		sea_defence = 3.15
		air_defence = 4.68
		hull = 0.54
		build_cost_ic = -0.65
		positioning = 0.05
	}

	can_upgrade = no
	stealable = no
	difficulty = 1
	start_year = 1960
	first_offset = 1961
	additional_offset = 1
	max_level = 6
}

largewarship_surface_radar_hidden = {

	allow = {
		 has_country_flag = impossible
	}
	BB_Missouri = {
		surface_detection = 1.5
		night = {
			attack = 0.05
			defence = 0.05
		}
	}
	BB_Iowa	 = {
		surface_detection = 1.5
		night = {
			attack = 0.05
			defence = 0.05
		}
	}
	BB_Jean_Bart	 = {
		surface_detection = 1.5
		night = {
			attack = 0.05
			defence = 0.05
		}

	#	north_sea = {

		 has_country_flag = impossible
